Steve Ballmer , chief executive of Microsoft, said the partnership would dramatically accelerate the development of a vibrant and strong Windows Phone ecosystem . Nokia and Microsoft have been working on the development of the first of the new phones for two months, but it will be about a year before the new phones hit the market.

Joe Lieberman came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back, Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him.`` Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out.'' Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds,
